ddl:
CREATE TABLE `spider2-public-data.legislation.legislators`
(
  full_name STRING,
  first_name STRING,
  last_name STRING,
  middle_name STRING,
  nickname STRING,
  suffix STRING,
  other_names_end DATE,
  other_names_middle STRING,
  other_names_last STRING,
  birthday DATE,
  gender STRING,
  id_bioguide STRING,
  id_bioguide_previous_0 STRING,
  id_govtrack INT64,
  id_icpsr FLOAT64,
  id_wikipedia STRING,
  id_wikidata STRING,
  id_google_entity_id STRING,
  id_house_history FLOAT64,
  id_house_history_alternate FLOAT64,
  id_thomas FLOAT64,
  id_cspan FLOAT64,
  id_votesmart FLOAT64,
  id_lis STRING,
  id_ballotpedia STRING,
  id_opensecrets STRING,
  id_fec_0 STRING,
  id_fec_1 STRING,
  id_fec_2 STRING
);

CREATE TABLE `spider2-public-data.legislation.legislators_terms`
(
  id_bioguide STRING,
  term_number INT64,
  term_id STRING,
  term_type STRING,
  term_start DATE,
  term_end DATE,
  state STRING,
  district FLOAT64,
  class FLOAT64,
  party STRING,
  how STRING,
  url STRING,
  address STRING,
  phone STRING,
  fax STRING,
  contact_form STRING,
  office STRING,
  state_rank STRING,
  rss_url STRING,
  caucus STRING
);
